description:
AWARD-WINNING GAMES FOR KIDS

Discover a world of creative play with tons of award-winning games for kids in one app! Children aged 2-5 build, create, and explore with thoughtfully designed games for toddlers that spark imagination.

Join over 100 million parents and start your free trial today! 

*** Winner of a Parents' Choice Gold Award, Webby's Nomination, Academics' Choice Smart Media Award, Kidscreen Award, and a W3 Mobile App Design Award. Featured in the New York Times, Guardian, and USA Today. ***

CREATIVE PLAY & SKILL-BUILDING GAMES FOR KIDS

Children are free to explore and play their way – the only limit is their imagination! Open-ended play means there are no rules in these games for toddlers. 

How children engage with these games for kids is completely up to them. Delight in safe, creative games for kids that encourage self-expression, empathy, and confidence.

SAFE, POSITIVE GAMES FOR KIDS

COPPA and kidSAFE-certified and no in-app purchases or ads for subscribers, Sago Mini World provides games for kids that parents can feel good about. Designed for intuitive play, it’s easy and safe for kids to explore the world on their own.

EXPLORE WITH YOUR OWN SAGO MINI FRIENDS

Explore new worlds in these games for kids, from outer space to a fantasy castle! There are tons of kids animal games, including mini dog games for kids. Plus, children can turn themselves into a Sago Mini character!

FEATURES

• Unlimited access to hundreds of games for kids, with countless worlds in one app
• Play pre-downloaded games offline without WiFi
• Updated monthly with new content, baby games, games for kids, and games for toddlers
• Use one subscription across multiple devices
• Subscribers get early access to all new games for kids, games for toddlers, and children aged 2-5
• COPPA and kidSAFE-certified – safe and easy games for toddlers
• No third-party advertising
• The perfect gift for kids, toddlers, and children

Sago Mini World is part of Piknik – a subscription bundle to the best kids apps! Get full access to the worlds best games for kids from Toca Boca and Sago Mini with an Unlimited Plan.

SUBSCRIPTION BENEFITS

• Try before you buy! Download the World app to start your free trial.
• Use one subscription across multiple devices for easy access to award-winning games for kids
• Cancel anytime with no hassle or fees.

Privacy Policy

Sago Mini is committed to protecting your privacy and the privacy of your children. We adhere to the strict guidelines set forth by COPPA (Children’s Online Privacy Protection Rule) & KidSAFE, which ensure the protection of your child’s information.

Privacy policy: https://playpiknik.link/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://playpiknik.link/terms-of-use/

About Sago Mini

Sago Mini is an award-winning company devoted to play. We make apps, games and toys for preschoolers worldwide. Toys that seed imagination and grow wonder. We bring thoughtful design to life. For kids. For parents. For giggles.

Find us on Instagram, Youtube, and TikTok at @sagomini.

Questions about our games for kids? Give the Sago Mini World team a shout at worldsupport@sagomini.com.
